div.pre: 2011 Sessa (anc. Suessa Aurunca), Cam- pania, 1930? Burial: c. 220 B.C. (Crawford) Contents: 35 AR, 3 AE. Pot hoard Cales: 1 AE Neapolis: 1 st.; 1 AE Campano-Tarentine: 2 st. Velia: 1 st.
